2.name: Pranav Patil
2.message: This is a demo feedback APP. There is no User Authentication or session management in this app. You can upvote a feedback any number of times. You can also delete anyone's feedback. There is a lot of scope for Improvement. Since this is a broad topic, I have implemented a basic version of the app. I hope you like it.

3.name: Alice Johnson
3.message: Yaay, great job! I really like the design and functionality of this feedback app. It's user-friendly and intuitive. Keep up the good work!
